snippet: Two adults and four children who were stranded in subzero temperatures in the Seven Troughs mountain range for nearly 48 hours were found alive and well.
abstract: Nevada authorities say that two adults and four children who were stranded in subzero temperatures in the Seven Troughs Mountain Range for nearly 48 hours were found alive and well.
lead_paragraph: Two adults and four children who were stranded in subzero temperatures in the Seven Troughs mountain range for nearly 48 hours were found alive and well.

headline.main: Nevada: Missing Family Is Found in Mountains
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Missing Family Is Found In Mountains
